lines.text: We don’t know who this guy is, why he got involved with that wizard, or why they’re both dead.
There’s a lot of pieces that don’t add up with this case, and I’ve got more than probable cause to say magic was involved.
So that’s it. You’re helping out today, wiz kid... unless you want to violate your parole.
How about you give me your best guess- your <c=#FF00FF>hypothesis-</c> about what happened here?
I’ll use my deductive talents and magical know-how to fill in the blanks, and we’ll have this chore done before breakfast.
First, what we know for sure: At 2:40am, we received a call from the landlord reporting a <c=#FF0000>fire.</c> According to the caller, the fire started at 2:35am…
But before that, the caller heard a <c=#FF0000>gunshot</c> at 2:10am. He ignored it at the time, but it was probably connected to this case somehow.
Don’t get ahead of yourself, kid.
We arrived on the scene at 2:50am, and after our initial investigation, I called you in. And because you dragged your feet, it’s 3:20am right now.
(3:20...! One hour off... from the drugs number...!)
...So, what did that ''initial investigation'' turn up?
